Package StratmasClient.proj

Class Summary
MGRSConversion This class implements the conversion between geodetic values (latitude and longitude) and MGRS coordinates.
PolarStereographicProjection This is implementation of the Polar Stereographic projection where (longitude/latitude) values are converted into (easting/northing) values and vice versa.
ProjectionConstants This class is used to define the global variables used in the coordinate conversion process.
ProjectionErrorHandler This class is used to handle the errors obtained in the coordinate conversion process.
UPSConversion This class converts geodetic values (longitude, latitude) into UPS coordinates and vice versa.
UPSCoordinate This class implements the UPS coordinate.
UTMCoordinate This class implements the UTM coordinate.
